DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety Huaier Granule prevention recurrence metastasis hepatocarcinoma radical hepatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Huaier Granule Prevention Recurrence Metastasis Hepatocarcinoma After Radical Hepatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: A Multicenter , Randomized , Paralleled control Clinical Study Investigating Huaier Granule Prevention Recurrence Metastasis Hepatocarcinoma Radical Hepatectomy , evaluate efficacy safety .
DOC.criteria: Age : ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year , male female ; Radical hepatectomy perform hepatocellular carcinoma ; The hepatocellular carcinoma confirm pathological examination ; Barcelona clinic liver cancer ( BCLC ) stage A B ; Not receive preoperative anticancer drug ; The liver kidney function satisfies follow condition within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , glutamicoxalacetic transaminase ( ALT ) < 3 upper limit normal ( ULN ) , total bilirubin≤2ULN , serum creatinine < 1.5 ULN ; Other laboratory test meet following requirement within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : Hb≥9g/dl , platelet count≥60×109/L , absolute neutrophil count > 1.0×109/L ; The expect survival time ≥ 12 week ; The subject volunteer sign inform consent . Hepatocellular carcinoma patient receive nonradical hepatectomy ; Nonhepatocellular carcinoma patient ; Those ChildPugh C ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Those active bleeding due various reason ; Those HIV infection AIDSassociated diseases ; Those severe acute chronic disease ; Those severe diabetes ; Those serious infectious disease ; Those take drug oral route ; Drug abuser psychological mental disease may interfere study compliance ; Conditions consider suitable study investigator
